name: Pew Pew Pong
description:
Welcome to Pew Pew Pong. This is a two player game where you shoot a ball and try to make the ball fly past your enemies defense.

Controls: 

Red Ship (Player 1):

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Alt - Shoot

Blue Ship (Player 2):

Up Arrow - Move Up

Left Arrow - Move Left

Down Arrow - Move Down

Right Arrow - Move Right

Shift - Shoot
